duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical support within and occasionally outside immediate team for network performance initiatives and outage resolution.
Takes on smaller projects or portions of key projects / initiatives, providing accurate status and progress updates as requested.
Identify and share potential process improvements. Recommend process improvements related to maintenance and repair activities.
Enroll in and complete training requirements to stay current on existing and new systems and products, to grow skills, and to expand proficiency in company values and organizational requirements.

education_certification.credential: Two-year vocational degree in a technical discipline or equivalent experience.
